item.title: Diapers and Football? Pampers Joins Swelling Ad Crowd Making Rush for NFL
item.description: When football fans tune into early games on CBS this Sunday, they may notice that some very young players are using extra padding. An inspiring 60-second spot from Pampers features an array of wee tyk
